item.title: How to create a virtual machine for Windows 11 using VMware Workstation Player 17
item.description:
The latest version of VMware Workstation Player includes the features needed to install Windows 11 as a virtual machine.

item.title: Ransomware Payments Decreased by 35% in 2024, Research Finds
item.description:
Ransomware payments dropped 35% in 2024 due to law enforcement crackdowns and stronger cyber defenses, forcing attackers to adapt with new tactics.
